mapper.select: SELECT su.*,so.ORG_NAME FROM sec_user su LEFT JOIN sec_org so ON su.ORG_ID=so.ID_ WHERE su.ID_=#{id}
SELECT su.ID_,su.USER_NAME,su.ORG_ID,su.sex FROM sec_user su WHERE su.DELETED=0 AND su.ORG_ID =#{orgId}

SELECT su.* FROM sec_user su WHERE su.DELETED=0 AND su.ORG_ID =#{orgId}
AND su.USER_NAME LIKE '%${userName}%'
SELECT * FROM sec_user WHERE DELETED=0 AND (ACCOUNT = #{account} OR MOBILE = #{account} OR EMAIL = #{account})
SELECT * FROM sec_user WHERE ACCOUNT=#{account} AND DELETED=0
SELECT count(*) FROM sec_user WHERE ACCOUNT=#{account} AND DELETED=0

select t.ID_,t.account,t.user_name,t.mobile,t.email FROM sec_user t where t.DELETED=0
AND t.ORG_ID like '%${orgId}%'
AND t.ID_ not in (select trm.USER_ID from sec_role_member trm WHERE t.ID_=trm.USER_ID AND trm.ROLE_ID=#{id})

SELECT * FROM sec_user WHERE DELETED = 0
AND ORG_ID IN(SELECT ID_ FROM sec_org WHERE FIND_IN_SET(ID_,F_getOrgChild(#{orgId})))
AND CONCAT(`USER_NAME`,`ACCOUNT`) LIKE '%${userName}%'
SELECT role.* FROM sec_role role WHERE role.DELETED=0 AND role.ID_ not in(SELECT ROLE_ID FROM sec_role_member WHERE USER_ID=#{id})

SELECT sec_user.ID_ AS ID, sec_user.USER_NAME AS NAME, sec_user.ORG_ID AS parentId, '用户' AS FLAG FROM sec_user WHERE DELETED = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(sec_user.ORG_ID, ( SELECT F_getOrgChild(sec_user.COMPANY_ID) FROM sec_user WHERE ID_ = #{userID} AND DELETED = 0 )) UNION ALL SELECT sec_org.ID_ AS ID, sec_org.ORG_NAME AS NAME, sec_org.PARENT_ID AS parentId, '组织' AS FLAG FROM sec_org WHERE DELETED = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(sec_org.ID_, ( SELECT F_getOrgChild(sec_user.COMPANY_ID) FROM sec_user WHERE ID_ = #{userID} AND DELETED = 0 ))

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT sec_user.ID_ AS ID, sec_user.USER_NAME AS NAME, sec_user.ORG_ID AS parentId, '用户' AS FLAG FROM sec_user WHERE DELETED = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(sec_user.ORG_ID, ( SELECT F_getOrgChild(sec_user.COMPANY_ID) FROM sec_user WHERE ID_ = #{id} AND DELETED = 0 )) UNION ALL SELECT sec_org.ID_ AS ID, sec_org.ORG_NAME AS NAME, sec_org.PARENT_ID AS parentId, '组织' AS FLAG FROM sec_org WHERE DELETED = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(sec_org.ID_, ( SELECT F_getOrgChild(sec_user.COMPANY_ID) FROM sec_user WHERE ID_ = #{id} AND DELETED = 0 )) ) b
WHERE NAME LIKE '%${userName}%';
